messages.id: We are waiting for your payment.
messages.message: We are waiting for your payment.
messages.translation: We are waiting for your payment.

messages.id: A payment is on the way, but we're still waiting for the required amount of confirmations on the blockchain.
messages.message: A payment is on the way, but we're still waiting for the required amount of confirmations on the blockchain.
messages.translation: A payment is on the way, but we're still waiting for the required amount of confirmations on the blockchain.

messages.id: We have received your payment, but have gone out of stock meanwhile. You will receive the missing codes here as soon as possible. Sorry for the inconvenience.
messages.message: We have received your payment, but have gone out of stock meanwhile. You will receive the missing codes here as soon as possible. Sorry for the inconvenience.
messages.translation: We have received your payment, but have gone out of stock meanwhile. You will receive the missing codes here as soon as possible. Sorry for the inconvenience.

messages.id: Error getting stock from database. Please try again later.
messages.message: Error getting stock from database. Please try again later.
messages.translation: Error getting stock from database. Please try again later.

messages.id: Error displaying website. Please try again later.
messages.message: Error displaying website. Please try again later.
messages.translation: Error displaying website. Please try again later.

messages.id: Our service thinks that you are a bot. If you are not, please contact us.
messages.message: Our service thinks that you are a bot. If you are not, please contact us.
messages.translation: Our service thinks that you are a bot. If you are not, please contact us.

messages.id: Error inserting purchase into database. Please try again later.
messages.message: Error inserting purchase into database. Please try again later.
messages.translation: Error inserting purchase into database. Please try again later.

messages.id: There is no such purchase, or it has been deleted.
messages.message: There is no such purchase, or it has been deleted.
messages.translation: There is no such purchase, or it has been deleted.

messages.id: Error saving notify information. Please try again later.
messages.message: Error saving notify information. Please try again later.
messages.translation: Error saving notify information. Please try again later.

messages.id: Buy coupons, voucher codes and gift cards for privacy services and pay anonymously with Monero, Bitcoin or cash letter. SEPA Bank transfer is also available.
messages.message: Buy coupons, voucher codes and gift cards for privacy services and pay anonymously with Monero, Bitcoin or cash letter. SEPA Bank transfer is also available.
messages.translation: Buy coupons, voucher codes and gift cards for privacy services and pay anonymously with Monero, Bitcoin or cash letter. SEPA Bank transfer is also available.

messages.id: Order with a few clicks. Pay with Monero, Bitcoin, cash in 20 currencies, or SEPA Bank transfer.
messages.message: Order with a few clicks. Pay with Monero, Bitcoin, cash in 20 currencies, or SEPA Bank transfer.
messages.translation: Order with a few clicks. Pay with Monero, Bitcoin, cash in 20 currencies, or SEPA Bank transfer.

messages.id: Bookmark your order. You will need it to access your goods.
messages.message: Bookmark your order. You will need it to access your goods.
messages.translation: Bookmark your order. You will need it to access your goods.

messages.id: Unpaid orders are deleted after 30 days.
messages.message: Unpaid orders are deleted after 30 days.
messages.translation: Unpaid orders are deleted after 30 days.

messages.id: Monero (XMR) or Bitcoin (BTC): Your voucher codes are shown as soon as your payment is confirmed on the blockchain.
messages.message: Monero (XMR) or Bitcoin (BTC): Your voucher codes are shown as soon as your payment is confirmed on the blockchain.
messages.translation: Monero (XMR) or Bitcoin (BTC): Your voucher codes are shown as soon as your payment is confirmed on the blockchain.

messages.id: Cash: Send cash (we accept 20 currencies) to our office in Germany. We shred the letter after processing.
messages.message: Cash: Send cash (we accept 20 currencies) to our office in Germany. We shred the letter after processing.
messages.translation: Cash: Send cash (we accept 20 currencies) to our office in Germany. We shred the letter after processing.

messages.id: SEPA (Single Euro Payments Area) bank transfer to our German bank account. We manually check for new payments every day.
messages.message: SEPA (Single Euro Payments Area) bank transfer to our German bank account. We manually check for new payments every day.
messages.translation: SEPA (Single Euro Payments Area) bank transfer to our German bank account. We manually check for new payments every day.

messages.id: Optional: Get notified by email or ntfy.sh when your payment arrives.
messages.message: Optional: Get notified by email or ntfy.sh when your payment arrives.
messages.translation: Optional: Get notified by email or ntfy.sh when your payment arrives.

messages.id: Write down your codes. We will delete them 30 days after delivery.
messages.message: Write down your codes. We will delete them 30 days after delivery.
messages.translation: Write down your codes. We will delete them 30 days after delivery.

messages.id: Where do you live? (We have to ask that for tax reasons. It does not affect the price or the goods.)
messages.message: Where do you live? (We have to ask that for tax reasons. It does not affect the price or the goods.)
messages.translation: Where do you live? (We have to ask that for tax reasons. It does not affect the price or the goods.)

messages.id: Please select your country of residence.
messages.message: Please select your country of residence.
messages.translation: Please select your country of residence.

messages.id: Country options are limited by your IP address and browser language.
messages.message: Country options are limited by your IP address and browser language.
messages.translation: Country options are limited by your IP address and browser language.

messages.id: JavaScript is disabled in your browser. In order to receive updates on your order, please reload this page from time to time.
messages.message: JavaScript is disabled in your browser. In order to receive updates on your order, please reload this page from time to time.
messages.translation: JavaScript is disabled in your browser. In order to receive updates on your order, please reload this page from time to time.

messages.id: Bookmark this page or save its address in another way. You will need it to access your goods.
messages.message: Bookmark this page or save its address in another way. You will need it to access your goods.
messages.translation: Bookmark this page or save its address in another way. You will need it to access your goods.

messages.id: Pay your order. (Unpaid orders are deleted after 30 days.)
messages.message: Pay your order. (Unpaid orders are deleted after 30 days.)
messages.translation: Pay your order. (Unpaid orders are deleted after 30 days.)

messages.id: As soon as your payment arrives, your voucher codes are shown. In the unlikely case that your goods have become sold out in the meantime, your codes will appear as soon as they are back in stock.
messages.message: As soon as your payment arrives, your voucher codes are shown. In the unlikely case that your goods have become sold out in the meantime, your codes will appear as soon as they are back in stock.
messages.translation: As soon as your payment arrives, your voucher codes are shown. In the unlikely case that your goods have become sold out in the meantime, your codes will appear as soon as they are back in stock.

messages.id: Optional: Get notified when your payment arrives
messages.message: Optional: Get notified when your payment arrives
messages.translation: Optional: Get notified when your payment arrives

messages.id: Get notified when your payment arrives and your voucher codes are shown. The notification will not contain the order number or the link. Your contact information will be deleted afterwards.
messages.message: Get notified when your payment arrives and your voucher codes are shown. The notification will not contain the order number or the link. Your contact information will be deleted afterwards.
messages.translation: Get notified when your payment arrives and your voucher codes are shown. The notification will not contain the order number or the link. Your contact information will be deleted afterwards.

messages.id: You will receive the missing codes here as soon as they are in stock again. Sorry for the inconvenience.
messages.message: You will receive the missing codes here as soon as they are in stock again. Sorry for the inconvenience.
messages.translation: You will receive the missing codes here as soon as they are in stock again. Sorry for the inconvenience.

messages.id: You will receive your codes as soon as you payment has arrived.
messages.message: You will receive your codes as soon as you payment has arrived.
messages.translation: You will receive your codes as soon as you payment has arrived.

messages.id: Got an idea or found an error? Drop us a note!
messages.message: Got an idea or found an error? Drop us a note!
messages.translation: Got an idea or found an error? Drop us a note!

messages.id: Pay with Monero (XMR) or Bitcoin (BTC). The full amount must be paid with a single transaction to the given address within 60 minutes. If your payment arrives too late, we have to confirm it manually. If in doubt, please contact us.
messages.message: Pay with Monero (XMR) or Bitcoin (BTC). The full amount must be paid with a single transaction to the given address within 60 minutes. If your payment arrives too late, we have to confirm it manually. If in doubt, please contact us.
messages.translation: Pay with Monero (XMR) or Bitcoin (BTC). The full amount must be paid with a single transaction to the given address within 60 minutes. If your payment arrives too late, we have to confirm it manually. If in doubt, please contact us.

messages.id: Send cash in an insured letter or package to our store address in Germany. After we take out the money, we shred the letter. Please check the cash shipment limits of your postal company (e. g. Deutsche Post „Einschreiben Wert“ up to 100 Euros within Germany, DHL Parcel up to 500 Euros). Send it to:
messages.message: Send cash in an insured letter or package to our store address in Germany. After we take out the money, we shred the letter. Please check the cash shipment limits of your postal company (e. g. Deutsche Post „Einschreiben Wert“ up to 100 Euros within Germany, DHL Parcel up to 500 Euros). Send it to:
messages.translation: Send cash in an insured letter or package to our store address in Germany. After we take out the money, we shred the letter. Please check the cash shipment limits of your postal company (e. g. Deutsche Post „Einschreiben Wert“ up to 100 Euros within Germany, DHL Parcel up to 500 Euros). Send it to:

messages.id: Please include a note with this order number
messages.message: Please include a note with this order number
messages.translation: Please include a note with this order number

messages.id: Pay the specified amount in one of the following currencies.
messages.message: Pay the specified amount in one of the following currencies.
messages.translation: Pay the specified amount in one of the following currencies.

messages.id: Please send banknotes only and round up if necessary. We do not accept coins.
messages.message: Please send banknotes only and round up if necessary. We do not accept coins.
messages.translation: Please send banknotes only and round up if necessary. We do not accept coins.

messages.id: We only send the order number to PayPal. Your ordered items and delivery or pickup details will not be sent to PayPal.
messages.message: We only send the order number to PayPal. Your ordered items and delivery or pickup details will not be sent to PayPal.
messages.translation: We only send the order number to PayPal. Your ordered items and delivery or pickup details will not be sent to PayPal.

messages.id: If you use TOR or a VPN: The payment options displayed depend on the country of your IP address. In addition, PayPal blocks some TOR exit nodes. In that case, try „New Circuit for this Site“.
messages.message: If you use TOR or a VPN: The payment options displayed depend on the country of your IP address. In addition, PayPal blocks some TOR exit nodes. In that case, try „New Circuit for this Site“.
messages.translation: If you use TOR or a VPN: The payment options displayed depend on the country of your IP address. In addition, PayPal blocks some TOR exit nodes. In that case, try „New Circuit for this Site“.

messages.id: Make a SEPA (Single Euro Payments Area) bank transfer to our German bank account. We manually check for new incoming payments every day. We will see your name and bank account number on our account statement. If you are making an international wire transfer, please select the „OUR“ fee option.
messages.message: Make a SEPA (Single Euro Payments Area) bank transfer to our German bank account. We manually check for new incoming payments every day. We will see your name and bank account number on our account statement. If you are making an international wire transfer, please select the „OUR“ fee option.
messages.translation: Make a SEPA (Single Euro Payments Area) bank transfer to our German bank account. We manually check for new incoming payments every day. We will see your name and bank account number on our account statement. If you are making an international wire transfer, please select the „OUR“ fee option.

messages.id: Or scan the EPC QR code:
messages.message: Or scan the EPC QR code:
